queriesList.query: 100 * (sum by (device) (system_filesystem_usage_bytes{ostype=~'linux|windows',hostname=~'.*', job='prom-metrics-collector', state='used',type='ext4',hostname=~'.*'}) /sum by (device) (system_filesystem_usage_bytes{ostype=~'linux|windows',hostname=~'.*', job='prom-metrics-collector', state=~'free|used'}))
queriesList.name: Local Storage Space
